# PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionType.refund

**Case**

A refund transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
case refund
```

## Discussion

Use this type to return money to the person’s card.

## Getting the transaction type

- **PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionType.purchase**: A purchase transaction.
